scripts.clean: rm -f *.vsix && for i in `ls tasks` ; do (cd tasks/$i; npm run clean); done
scripts.build: for i in `ls tasks` ; do (cd `pwd`/tasks/$i; npm run build); done
scripts.test: for i in `ls tasks` ; do (cd ./tasks/$i; npm run test); done
scripts.bump-task-version: for i in `ls tasks` ; do TASK=$(cat tasks/$i/task.json | json -e 'this.version.Patch++'); echo "$TASK" > tasks/$i/task.json; done
scripts.premarket: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test && npm run bump-task-version
